Package use_cases.gameplay

Class AnagramGameUseCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • use_cases.gameplay.AnagramGameUseCase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnagramGameInputBoundary
    public class AnagramGameUseCase
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnagramGameInputBoundary
    A class that executes both anagram games. It implements AnagramGameInputBoundary, and contains an anagramChecker to check for anagrams, a scanner to read the user input, and a highScoreManager to delegate high score functionalities.

    • Constructor Summary

      • checkAnagrams

        protected boolean checkAnagrams​(java.lang.String word1,
                                java.lang.String word2)
        Checks if two words are anagrams by calling the anagramChecker's areAnagrams method.
        Parameters:
        word1 - the first word
        word2 - the second word
        Returns:
        a boolean that is true if they are anagrams and false if not
